# Windows interaction using gyro
# Clear previous settings
RESET_MAPPINGS

# Calibration
REAL_WORLD_CALIBRATION = 5.3333
IN_GAME_SENS = 1
COUNTER_OS_MOUSE_SPEED

# Button mappings
GYRO_OFF = E
LLEFT = LEFT
LRIGHT = RIGHT
LUP = UP
LDOWN = DOWN
R = LMOUSE
L = RMOUSE
+ = ESC
ZL = LSHIFT
S = SPACE
N = ESC

# Include mouse settings
GyroConfigs/_2Dmouse.txt
